description: Clean up Phase 2 work-in-progress to restore Phase 1 baseline. Another agent worked on Phase 2 conditional modules in parallel, creating critical bugs (dataclass vs dict mismatch). Need to preserve their work, revert modified files, and restore production-ready state.
goal: Restore coderef-docs to working Phase 1 baseline while preserving all Phase 2 work for future completion
requirements: Create backup patch of 3 modified files (characteristics.py, modules/__init__.py, types.py)
Create archive of 11 untracked conditional module files
Revert 3 modified files to Phase 1 baseline
Update plan.json to mark Phase 2 tasks as blocked
Document Phase 2 status and resumption instructions
Clean commit explaining multi-agent conflict resolution
constraints: Must not lose any Phase 2 work
Phase 1 must remain production-ready (100% tests passing)
Must be reversible (patches allow resuming Phase 2)
